title: libert19
author: libert19
content: Every once in a while, someone posts 'Bitcointalk needs mentions support', and someone replies there is telegram bot for that. Would that not be useful making people aware of this bot's existence in News bar or through welcome message so everyone comes to know about it naturally?

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Because it's a third party project, just like BPIP and Loyce.club. The forum administration isn't directly involved with them, so it is up to the members to look up such information, just like they should use the search button for any other query that has been asked before.If we are going to include every frequently asked question in the welcome message, then it would be a mess. Imagine questions like “When NTF board?” appearing there because someone it too lazy to use the search button.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.created_time: August 06, 2022, 07:14:39 AMLast edit: August 06, 2022, 09:18:36 AM by Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: libert19 on August 06, 2022, 04:52:37 AMWould that not be useful making people aware of this bot's existence in News bar or through welcome message so everyone comes to know about it naturally? They are third parties. Nothing even like bitcointalk notifying new users, like through the forum email notification. People that are passionately posting or actively posting on this forum will know about them, not knowing about it is like they do not need it.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: I don't think the forum (aka theymos) will directly advertise any such service. And if so, why SuperNotifier and not one of the other bots or services offered by our forum members? Maybe no one asked to have their site advertised. I am sure that if you PMed theymos, he would tall you straight if he would be interested in giving it such promotion, and if not, why not. Do it and let us know what he says.
